snippet.title: Project Dosa Teaser
snippet.description:
Platform through a vibrant world in an upgradeable mech and cook delicious meals. Fight off corpos in turn based combat, discover new recipes, build up your reputation with local communities, and bond with friends and family on a journey to taste everything life has to offer.

From Outerloop Games comes Project Dosa, a game about life, love and loss. Join sisters Samara and Amani as they eat the world and taste everything life has to offer. Reunite with the people you love, defeat the forces of capitalism (metaphorically) and eat one last meal before saying goodbye.
